column5: Can anyone recommend a place to stay in Dunnville?  My dad and I are looking for a decent (yet inexpensive) motel to stay for one night (this Friday).  We’re just need a goodnight’s rest and a shower - We’ll be roughing it out at a carp tourney the next couple of days.  Thanks

I think there's a Motel at the north corner of the bridge.  http://maps.google.ca/maps?f=d&source=...e=UTF8&z=17  I'm sure there are smaller "mom/pop" motels in town too... check it out - the town isn't too large anyway. Or better yet... MSG Fishmaster - he's in the area... he could better lead you.

On your way to dunnville you will see a motel on your right about 1km before the bridge. PM for potential spots to try if interested since your making the trek from the GTA. I saw them playing on the top of the surface in the shallows about 3+ weeks ago. Good luck.
Thanks guys for your help.  I really appreciate it   I'm not sure if it's the same island.  We'll be fishing a little downstream of the conservation area
